summary: Feature request to allow users to set search attributes during dev server startup in the PHP SDK, with the attributes translating to --search-attribute CLI calls.
userImpact: Users can configure search attributes when starting the dev server, improving developer workflow and testing flexibility.
proposedFix: Add search attributes option to dev server startup that translates to --search-attribute CLI calls, following the pattern established in temporalio/cli#593.
resolutionDetails: Feature implemented to accept search attributes in dev server startup configuration.
keyQuote: users should be allowed to set search attributes in dev server option that translate to `--search-attribute` calls
